numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Light pink represents head coaches of color.
3. Dark pink represents players of color.
4. From 2020, the percentage seems to decrease from basketball to baseball.
5. I wonder why the percentage changes over time.
6. I wonder why the percentage differs between sports.
7. This graph does not really impact me.
9. This graph shows that race is still a factor in today's society.
10. This graph shows how the percentage of players of color changes over time.
11. This graph shows how the percentage of players of color differs between sports.
12. The headline is: Society changes in sports.
